name: Randomic
tagline: A friendly user interface to extract random items from a simple list (based on underscore random method and timestamp)
body:
> A friendly user interface to extract random items (based on [underscore random method](http://underscorejs.org/#random) and timestamp) from a simple list.


## Installation
```bash
$ cd <frontend-app-folder>
$ sudo npm install -g gulp bower
$ sudo npm install
$ bower install
```
